name: Robotic Typing Spree
description:
A dying child robot finds a pumpkin as a head, which lets him live for a short period of time. He seeks the Dullahan “Evolvit” for eternal life, while the Dullahan wants his head. Now “Little Lumpkin” must climb the Dullahan’s robotic tower to face him.

Travel through Evolvit's tower collecting clues to counter Evolvit's attacks and defeat him in the end! 

Although there is a catch... you only have 1 minute to do it!
